mapper.select: select m.meta_data_id as metaDataId, m.identity_id as identityId, m.name as fileName, m.file_path as filePath FROM mo_model m INNER JOIN mo_algorithm a ON m.train_algorithm_id = a.algorithm_id where m.train_user_address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.supported_algorithm_id = #{algorithmId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and m.identity_id = #{identityId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select m.meta_data_id, m.identity_id, o.node_name, o.image_url, m.train_algorithm_id, m.create_time from mo_model m inner join dc_org o on m.identity_id = o.identity_id order by m.create_time desc limit #{size}
